meanings.definition: Failing to perform as expected or required.
meanings.sent1: The nonperforming computer kept freezing during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The nonperforming student did not complete the assignment on time.
meanings.sent3: The nonperforming toaster decided to burn the toast instead of toasting it.
meanings.sent4: The nonperforming car engine sputtered and stalled on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The nonperforming light bulb flickered and went out suddenly.

meanings.definition: Not fulfilling or achieving the desired outcome.
meanings.sent1: The nonperforming basketball team lost every game this season.
meanings.sent2: The nonperforming recipe resulted in a burnt cake.
meanings.sent3: The nonperforming umbrella flipped inside out in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The nonperforming clock stopped working and was always showing the wrong time.
meanings.sent5: The nonperforming phone battery died after only an hour of use.
